info.name: StagePass API
info.description: Collection to test StagePass API endpoints for Stripe Connect (Express & Standard), Payments, Stripe Data, and Webhooks.

request.description: Deletes the connected Stripe account for the provided theaterId and clears local mapping.
Deletes the specified Stripe account by accountId (does not touch local mapping).
Deletes ALL Stripe Express accounts in the database. This will delete each Express account from Stripe and clear the local database mapping. Returns detailed results including any errors encountered.
This will redirect to Stripe. Open in browser from Postman or copy URL.
Create a Stripe subscription for a user. Payment method must be created via Stripe.js first.
Complete a subscription after payment is confirmed. Creates local subscription record.
Cancel a subscription. Set cancelAtPeriodEnd to false to cancel immediately.
Get subscription status and details from Stripe
Create a new product in the main Stripe account with name, description, images, and metadata.
Create a price for a specific product in the main Stripe account.
Create a new product in a specific connected Stripe account.
Create a price for a specific product in a connected Stripe account.
Get comprehensive Stripe data for all connected accounts including summary statistics, account details, balances, and recent transactions.
Get detailed information for a specific theater's connected account including balance, transactions, and account status.
Get all products from Stripe including pricing information, metadata, and images.
Get all payments/charges from Stripe including refunds, payment methods, and summary statistics.
Get all customers from Stripe including contact information, payment methods, and subscription status.
Get all subscriptions from Stripe including pricing, billing cycles, and subscription status.
Get comprehensive Stripe data overview including all data (accounts, products, payments, customers, subscriptions) with summary statistics.
Update an existing product in the main Stripe account.
Update an existing product in a connected Stripe account.
Delete a product from the main Stripe account.
Delete a product from a connected Stripe account.
Get all products from a specific connected Stripe account including pricing information, metadata, and images.
Get all payments/charges from a specific connected Stripe account including refunds, payment methods, and summary statistics.
Get all customers from a specific connected Stripe account including contact information, payment methods, and subscription status.
Get all subscriptions from a specific connected Stripe account including pricing, billing cycles, and subscription status.
Get comprehensive overview of all Stripe data from a specific connected account including account details, products, payments, customers, and subscriptions.
Typically test via Stripe CLI: `stripe listen --forward-to localhost:4242/webhooks/stripe`
Create a new user with displayName, email, and optional fields. Role can be 'customer', 'seller', or 'admin'
Get all users with optional filtering by role and pagination
Get a specific user by ID
Update a user with all fields
Partially update a user with only specified fields
Delete a user by ID

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Hamilton",
  "description": "The revolutionary musical about Alexander Hamilton",
  "shortDescription": "Revolutionary musical about Alexander Hamilton",
  "imageURL": "https://example.com/hamilton.jpg",
  "sellerId": "{{seller_id}}",
  "venue": {
    "name": "Richard Rodgers Theatre",
    "address": "226 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036"
  },
  "duration": 165,
  "categories": ["musical", "drama", "historical"],
  "status": "active"
}

Delete a production by ID

Get performances within a date range
Get performances for a specific venue
Get all performances without any filters
Get performances with pagination (2 per page)
Get performances for a specific date (October 4, 2025)
Get all performances for a specific production
Get a specific performance by ID
Update a performance
Partially update a performance
Delete a performance by ID
Create a new venue with name, address, city, state, and sellerId
Get all venues with optional filtering by seller, location, capacity range, and pagination
Get a specific venue by ID
Get all venues for a specific seller with optional filtering by location and capacity range
Update a venue
Partially update a venue
Delete a venue by ID
Create a new seatmap for a venue
Get all seatmaps for a venue
Get a specific seatmap by ID
Update a seatmap
Partially update a seatmap
Delete a seatmap by ID
Create a new order with tickets
Get all orders with optional filtering and pagination
Get a specific order by ID
Get all orders for a specific user
Get all orders for a specific seller
Get all orders for a specific user
Update an order
Partially update an order
Delete an order by ID

formdata.description: Folder to store the file in
Whether to make the file public (true/false)
User ID who uploaded the file

request.description: Upload a single file to Firebase Storage (general upload)

formdata.description: Whether to make the file public (true/false)
User ID who uploaded the file

request.description: Upload a venue image with structured path: venues/{venue_id}/{filename}

formdata.description: Whether to make the file public (true/false)
User ID who uploaded the file

request.description: Upload a production image with structured path: productions/{production_id}/{filename}

formdata.description: Folder to store the files in
Whether to make the files public (true/false)
User ID who uploaded the files

request.description: Upload multiple files to Firebase Storage (up to 10 files)

formdata.description: Whether to make the file public (true/false)

request.description: Upload a venue image with new structure: users/{userId}/venue_images/{venueId}/{fileName}

formdata.description: Whether to make the file public (true/false)

request.description: Upload a production image with new structure: users/{userId}/production_images/{productionId}/{fileName}

formdata.description: Whether to make the file public (true/false)

request.description: Upload user avatar with new structure: users/{userId}/settings_images/avatar.{ext} (always overwrites existing avatar)
Get information about a specific file
Delete a file from Firebase Storage
Get all available subscription plans with pricing and features
Get a specific subscription plan by ID
Get only active subscription plans

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Premium Plan",
  "price": 1999,
  "ticketLimit": 5000,
  "productionLimit": 10,
  "features": ["Advanced seat mapping", "Priority support", "Analytics dashboard"],
  "isActive": true,
  "stripeProductId": "prod_abc123",
  "stripePriceId": "price_xyz789"
}

request.description: Create a new subscription plan

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Updated Premium Plan",
  "price": 2499,
  "ticketLimit": 10000,
  "productionLimit": 20,
  "features": ["Advanced seat mapping", "Priority support", "Analytics dashboard", "Custom branding"],
  "isActive": true,
  "stripeProductId": "prod_updated123",
  "stripePriceId": "price_updated789"
}

Delete a subscription plan by ID
